name: Asteroid Incident
description:
Asteroid Incident is a retro-style asteroid game with a 16-bit art style.

Dodge and shoot asteroid with awesome ships, and purchase new ones.

Asteroid Incident is a updated version of an earlier game called Asteroid Belt 12B

The game was developed entirely by the creator, Xsplice. The owner of optical games.

You can follow our twitter and youtube here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_RTFBZf8ikI714z2ZHXJ8A?view_as=subscriber

https://twitter.com/games_optical
